org.epics.pvData.channelAccess
Interface Channel

All Superinterfaces:
Requester
public interface Channel
extends Requester

Interface for accessing a channel. A channel is created via a call to ChannelAccess.createChannel(String channelName).

Author:
mrk

destroy

void destroy()
Destroy the channel. It will not honor any further requests.

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Is the channel connected?

Returns:
(false,true) means (not, is) connected.

getField

void getField(GetFieldRequester requester,
              java.lang.String subField)
Get a Field which describes the subField. GetFieldRequester.getDone is called after both client and server have processed the getField request. This is for clients that want to introspect a PVRecord via channel access. MAJEJ Neither client or server needs to save this info.

Parameters:
requester - The requester.
subField - The name of the subField. If this is null or an empty string the returned Field is for the entire record.

createPVStructure

void createPVStructure(CreatePVStructureRequester requester,
                       PVStructure pvRequest,
                       java.lang.String structureName,
                       boolean shareData)
Create a PVStructure for communication with the server. CreatePVStructureRequester.createDone is called after both client and server have processed the create request.

Parameters:
requester - The requester.
pvRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
structureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure. MATEJ Should it be required that this is unique for each call to getStructure?
shareData - On the remote side should the companion PVStructure share data with the PVRecord.

getAccessRights

AccessRights getAccessRights(PVField pvField)
Get the access rights for a field of a PVStructure created via a call to createPVStructure. MATEJ Channel access can store this info via auxInfo.

Parameters:
pvField - The field for which access rights is desired.
Returns:
The access rights.

createChannelProcess

void createChannelProcess(ChannelProcessRequester channelProcessRequester)
Create a ChannelProcess. ChannelProcessRequester.channelProcessReady is called after both client and server are ready for the client to make a process request.

Parameters:
channelProcessRequester - The interface for notifying when this request is complete and when channel completes processing.

createChannelGet

void createChannelGet(ChannelGetRequester channelGetRequester,
                      PVStructure pvRequest,
                      java.lang.String structureName,
                      boolean shareData,
                      boolean process)
Create a ChannelGet. ChannelGetRequester.channelGetReady is called after both client and server are ready for the client to make a get request.

Parameters:
channelGetRequester - The interface for notifying when this request is complete and when a channel get completes.
pvRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
structureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure.
shareData - On the remote side should the companion PVStructure share data with the PVRecord.
process - Process before getting data.

createChannelPut

void createChannelPut(ChannelPutRequester channelPutRequester,
                      PVStructure pvRequest,
                      java.lang.String structureName,
                      boolean shareData,
                      boolean process)
Create a ChannelPut. ChannelPutRequester.channelPutReady is called after both client and server are ready for the client to make a put request.

Parameters:
channelPutRequester - The interface for notifying when this request is complete and when a channel get completes.
pvRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
structureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure.
shareData - On the remote side should the companion PVStructure share data with the PVRecord.
process - Process before getting data.

createChannelPutGet

void createChannelPutGet(ChannelPutGetRequester channelPutGetRequester,
                         PVStructure pvPutRequest,
                         java.lang.String putStructureName,
                         boolean sharePutData,
                         PVStructure pvGetRequest,
                         java.lang.String getStructureName,
                         boolean shareGetData,
                         boolean process)
Create a ChannelPutGet. ChannelPutGetRequester.channelPutGetReady is called after both client and server are ready for the client to make a putGet request.

Parameters:
channelPutGetRequester - The interface for notifying when this request is complete and when a channel get completes.
pvPutRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
putStructureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure.
sharePutData - On the remote side should the companion PVStructure share data with the PVRecord.
pvGetRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
getStructureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure.
shareGetData - On the remote side should the companion PVStructure share data with the PVRecord.
process - Process after put and before get.

createChannelMonitor

void createChannelMonitor(ChannelMonitorRequester channelMonitorRequester,
                          PVStructure pvRequest,
                          java.lang.String structureName,
                          PVStructure pvOption,
                          Executor executor)
Create a ChannelMonitor. ChannelMonitorRequester.channelMonitorReady is called after both client and server are ready for the client to make a monitor request.

Parameters:
channelMonitorRequester - The channelMonitorRequester.
pvRequest - A structure describing the desired set of fields from the remote PVRecord. This has the same form as a pvRequest to PVCopyFactory.create.
structureName - The name to give to the created PVStructure.
pvOption - Monitor options.
executor - An executor for calling requester.
